item.title: ‘We’re both on the title’: I’m on the loan for our $2.2 million home. We split up, but my husband won’t sell. What now?
item.description: “He contributed a $1 million down payment. I mortgaged the rest in my name.”

item.title: Bond yields drift ahead of payrolls data, Powell speech
item.description: Bond yields drifted lower Friday ahead of a crucial day on the economics calendar with jobs data and a speech from Fed Chair Jerome Powell.

item.title: The biggest Tesla bull on Wall Street says the selloff over Musk’s politics is overdone
item.description: Wall Street’s biggest bull explains why Tesla investors are getting too overwrought by concerns over Elon Musk’s close ties to the U.S. administration...

item.title: JPMorgan says the stock market may need more time to get to its year-end target
Trump signs order establishing strategic bitcoin reserve. But it’s not what crypto industry ultimately wants.
item.description: Bitcoin fell after President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday evening to establish a strategic bitcoin reserve and a separate digital-a...
